org.opentcs.util.math

Interface Arithmetic<E>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - The data type the mathematical operations apply to.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IntegerArithmetic

    public interface Arithmetic<E>
    Declares methods for mathematical operations on generic data types.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      E add(E summand1, E summand2)
      Returns the sum of the given summands.
      E divide(E dividend, E divisor)
      Returns the quotient of the given parameters.
      E getNeutralAddElement()
      Returns the neutral element for additions.
      E getNeutralMulElement()
      Returns the neutral element for multiplications.
      E multiply(E factor1, E factor2)
      Returns the product of the given parameters.
      E subtract(E minuend, E subtrahend)
      Returns the difference of the given parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • getNeutralAddElement

        E getNeutralAddElement()
        Returns the neutral element for additions.
        Returns:
        The neutral element for additions.

      • getNeutralMulElement

        E getNeutralMulElement()
        Returns the neutral element for multiplications.
        Returns:
        The neutral element for multiplications.

      • add

        E add(E summand1,
      E summand2)
        Returns the sum of the given summands. If any of the given summands is null, it is replaced by the neutral element for additions.
        Parameters:
        summand1 - The first summand.
        summand2 - The second summand.
        Returns:
        The sum of the given summands.

      • subtract

        E subtract(E minuend,
           E subtrahend)
        Returns the difference of the given parameters. If any of the given summands is null, it is replaced by the neutral element for additions.
        Parameters:
        minuend - The minuend.
        subtrahend - The subtrahend.
        Returns:
        The difference of the given parameters.

      • multiply

        E multiply(E factor1,
           E factor2)
        Returns the product of the given parameters. If any of the given summands is null, it is replaced by the neutral element for multiplications.
        Parameters:
        factor1 - The first factor.
        factor2 - The second factor.
        Returns:
        The product of the given parameters.

      • divide

        E divide(E dividend,
         E divisor)
        Returns the quotient of the given parameters. If any of the given summands is null, it is replaced by the neutral element for multiplications.
        Parameters:
        dividend - The dividend.
        divisor - The divisor.
        Returns:
        The quotient of the given parameters.
